page.title: 01A day in the life of Kevin.
page.content: A typical day for me begins at 7.15 when the alarm goes off.Breakfast is at 7.30 and consists of cereal,toast and fruit juice.After breakfast I get ready for school and at 8.00 I go to my friends house because they take me to school.At 9.00 a teacher blows the whistle and school begins.Lessons start after class prayers.I spend the morning doing religion,maths,english or topic. We play football at playtime which is from 10.45 to 11.00.Lunch is at 12.00 and today we had sausages,chips and beans.After lunch we play until 1.00. In the afternoon we go swimming and I have passed my 400 metres badge.We come back at 2.45 and have a spelling test. Then we have play and after that we do individual topic work.School finishes at 3.30.When I get home I like to play on my computer with my friend or play games outside.
